content: Collaborate on one or multiple documents with your team

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a description for collaboration rooms in a shared component, typically appearing on a button or dialog related to team document collaboration. It guides users on how to collaborate on one or multiple documents with their team.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tee yhteistyötä yhden tai useiden dokumenttien luomisessa tiimisi kanssa' is a bit clunky and doesn't perfectly capture the simplicity of the English phrase. While technically correct, it is overly verbose.  'luomisessa' (in creation) is not the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tee yhteistyötä tiimisi kanssa yhden tai useamman dokumentin parissa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'yhden tai useiden dokumenttien' could be slightly improved for flow. Using 'yhden tai useamman dokumentin' is more concise.
The Romanian translation uses "în documentul sau în mai multe documente". A more natural phrasing would be "în document sau în mai multe documente". The repetition of 'în' is awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Colaborați în document sau în mai multe documente cu echipa dvs

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Collaborate on' implies a more active participation than the Russian 'Совместная работа с'. 'Совместная работа с' is more passive, simply stating 'joint work with'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Совместно работайте с командой над одним или несколькими документами

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Совместная работа с командой над одним или несколькими документами' is a bit long and potentially clunky. Consider breaking it up for readability, although the impact is minor.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Работайте с командой над одним или несколькими документами для совместной работы.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබගේ කණ්ඩායම සමඟ ලේඛනයක හෝ කිහිපයක සහයෝගයෙන් වැඩ කරන්න' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase 'Collaborate on one or multiple documents with your team.' It sounds a bit formal and clunky in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing such as 'ඔබේ කණ්ඩායමට සමඟ ලේඛනයක් හෝ වැඩිමහල් වැඩකට එක් වෙන්න' or 'ඔබේ කණ්ඩායම සමඟ එක්ව ලේඛන වැඩකට සහයෝගයෙන් වැඩ කරන්න.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Сарађуј на једном или више докумената са својим тимом' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Collaborate on one or multiple documents with your team.' The English implies a shared space or feature; the Serbian translation just means 'collaborate'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Радите заједно на једном или више докумената са својим тимом

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'Сарађуј' is in the imperative form, which may not be appropriate for all contexts (e.g., a help article).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Радите заједно на једном или више докумената са својим тимом (more suitable for instructional contexts)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Sarađuj na jednom ili više dokumenata sa svojim timom" is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Radite zajedno na jednom ili više dokumenata sa vašim timom' or 'Saradjujte na jednom ili više dokumenata sa svojim timom'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Radite zajedno na jednom ili više dokumenata sa vašim timom

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, using 'Sarađuj' (second person singular informal imperative) isn't appropriate for a general product description. It's better to use a more formal and inclusive form like 'Radite' (second person plural imperative) or 'Saradjujte' (formal imperative).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Saradjujte na jednom ili više dokumenata sa svojim timom

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Працюйте над одним або кількома документами разом зі своєю командою' while understandable, doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Collaborate'. 'Працюйте над...разом зі своєю командою' translates more literally to 'Work on...together with your team'. 'Collaborate' implies a shared effort and can be better conveyed with a more dynamic verb.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Співпрацюйте над одним або кількома документами з вашою командою
